title: Joker's Updates - BB Updates (Quick View)
text: Change theme: Old Quick View: The old Updates Quick View page can be found HERE Feedback: If you have feedback or to report a problem or suggestion with the new layout Contact Us FAQ: - Click for acronym list - Older BB USA/OTT/Canada updates are located in ARCHIVES- To post live feed updates, become a member by registering and post in the BB Updates forum. Quick View Notes: - Replies to updates in Quick View are grouped by the main topic, and will appear out of order. - Times are displayed as Big Brother Time (BBT). PT for BB USA, EST for BB Canada. - 'Refresh' button will bold new update times since opening Quick View (check time resets each visit) - When using page jumpers refreshing the page will not show new updates on page 1 unless you click 'refresh'
